basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. A. DeWade Langley Endowed Law Enforcement Scholarship

description: The recipient(s) of the DeWade Langley Endowed Law Enforcement Scholarship will meet the following criteria: Complete application Declared Criminal Justice Major Minimum 2.5 combined retention GPA Current or former law enforcement officer Demonstrated financial need as shown through FAFSA completion U.S. Citizen The recipient(s) will be selected in the spring for distribution in the following fall and spring semesters.

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
